Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Among the other 11 unique mutations , 8 were small deletions or insertions predicted to cause frameshifts , 1 was a mutation to a stop codon , 1 was a missense mutation , and 1 was predicted to cause insertion of an isoleucine in the hect domain of the UBE3A protein , which functions in E2 binding and ubiquitin transfer .

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for my mistake. Here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Disease":

I removed "insertion of an isoleucine in the hect domain of the UBE3A protein" since it does not clearly refer to a disease, but rather a specific genetic mutation that may cause a disease.
